As Pegatron stand up after a while on the ground,he take out his 
proton canon and aim for SS.Even with his damaged he still don't want 
him to hurt anyone else.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "dewboy30816" <dewboy30816@y...> wrote:
> SS flips in such a way the fire and the missile run into each other 
> completly missing him.  HE goes another freefall sending 8 laser 
beams 
> at Hot Rod then swooping down close to the ground until he's right 
> under Epyon and charging at mach 1 straight up.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> > ::Epyon/Hot Rod::
> > 
> > Epyon flips around the fire. He is now confedent, that he has 
> regained
> > the upper hand here. He flies across shooting two optic laser 
beams 
> at
> > SS.
> > 
> > Meanwhile Hot Rod takes this oppertunity, and shoots two missiles 
at 
> SS,
> > unoticed.
> > "That's right, stay with Epyon. Leave you dragon ass wide open..."
